--- Christopher <adagiogray@...> wrote:
> Hi, I'm new to the list, old to EQ. :)
>
> I started playing back in late 99, I believe.
> I started a guild called the Sisters of Mercy on the
> Bristlebane
> server, still going after all this time.
>
> I'm located in central Ohio, and always on the
> lookout for other
> players in the area for RL meet-n-greets.
>

>
